title: Trump’s Truth Social Launches on Apple’s App Store, With Glitches
sub_head: Some would-be users of the Twitter-like app reported being unable to create an account shortly after it went live
body:
Donald Trump’s social-networking platform, Truth Social, has gone live in the U.S., but some would-be users reported being unable to create an account or received error messages when trying to do so. Others were prompted to join a wait list.
Still, the Twitter -like app owned by Trump Media & Technology Group, was top of Apple Inc.’s App Store’s free apps chart early Tuesday after becoming available to download Monday.
